Sadiq Sani Sadiq (amụrụ na 2 Febụwarị 1981) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri. N'afọ 2012 o sonyere na Blood and Henna, ihe nkiri Naijiria nke Kenneth Gyang duziri ya na Nafisat Abdullahi na Ali Nuhu. Ọ natala ihe nrite na nhọpụta nke gụnyere 2015 Kannywood Awards na ndị ọka ikpe nke MTN Nigeria haziri, City People Entertainment nyere ya ihe nrite na 2014 na 2017. Ọ lụrụ di ma nwee ụmụ abụọ.
Sadiq emeela ihe nkiri kannywood karịrị narị abụọ.
